channel.desc: Channel where the item is pinned to.

timestamp.desc: Timestamp of the message to un-pin.

desc: Un-pins an item from a channel.

errors.file_comment_not_found: File comment specified by `file_comment` does not exist.
errors.file_not_found: File specified by `file` does not exist.
errors.message_not_found: Message specified by `channel` and `timestamp` does not exist.
errors.no_item_specified: One of `file`, `file_comment`, or `timestamp` was not specified.
errors.not_pinned: The specified item is not pinned to the channel.
errors.permission_denied: The user does not have permission to remove pins from the channel.
